Background:

Just your friendly neighborhood physics-junkie living the uncertain life of a recent college graduate. I'm from AZ but I came to MA in 2008 to attend Wellesley College and I am loving this whole "rain" thing that's going on here. I'm the type who likes to take things apart, analyze them from the from the outside in and figure out how stuff works. When I'm not accidentally breaking things, I'm probably dabbling in arts and crafts, looking up random facts about potatoes or wandering the city discovering new spaces.
